original_title: SL rupee surpasses Rs. 300 again against USD
original_body_lines: Despite the Sri Lankan Rupee maintaining a steady rate of around Rs. 285 against the US Dollar during the last few weeks, it further depreciated today crossing the Rs. 300 mark, according to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, today's buying rate of an USD is Rs 303.19 while the selling rate is Rs. 318.99.
Yesterday's buying rate of an USD was Rs. 294.91 while the selling rate was Rs. 309.22.
